mapper.sql: A.ID as A_ID, A.FOLDER_ID as A_FOLDER_ID, A.NAME as A_NAME, A.ACTIVITY_ID as A_ACTIVITY_ID, A.DESCRIPTION as A_DESCRIPTION, A.REMARK as A_REMARK, A.PASSSCORE as A_PASSSCORE, A.RECORD_STATUS as A_RECORD_STATUS, A.UPDATE_COUNT as A_UPDATE_COUNT, A.CREATOR_ID as A_CREATOR_ID, A.CREATE_DATE as A_CREATE_DATE, A.UPDATER_ID as A_UPDATER_ID, A.UPDATE_DATE as A_UPDATE_DATE
mapper.insert:
select RES_SCORE_SHEET_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into RES_SCORE_SHEET (ID, FOLDER_ID, NAME, ACTIVITY_ID, DESCRIPTION, REMARK, PASSSCORE, RECORD_STATUS, UPDATE_COUNT, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATE_DATE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{folderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE} )
mapper.update:
update RES_SCORE_SHEET A
A.ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.FOLDER_ID = #{record.folderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.ACTIVITY_ID = #{record.activityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.PASSSCORE = #{record.passScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.RECORD_STATUS = #{record.recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.UPDATE_COUNT = #{record.updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
A.UPDATER_ID = #{record.updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.UPDATE_DATE = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=DATE},

update RES_SCORE_SHEET A
A.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.FOLDER_ID = #{folderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.ACTIVITY_ID = #{activityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.PASSSCORE = #{passScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.RECORD_STATUS = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.UPDATE_COUNT = #{updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
A.UPDATER_ID = #{updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where A.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select , B.NAME AS FOLDER_NAME from RES_SCORE_SHEET A INNER JOIN RES_FOLDER B ON A.FOLDER_ID = B.ID where A.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
